com.djammr.westernknights.util.controllers

Class UIController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.djammr.westernknights.util.controllers.UIController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Controller
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DebugController

    public class UIController
extends java.lang.Object
implements Controller
    Suggested base for User Interface Controllers, regardless of whether the view is a fancy GUI or a humble text based system
